benchmark_details.name: Robustness Benchmark for Reference-Free Dialogue Evaluation
benchmark_details.overview: This benchmark evaluates the robustness of reference-free dialogue metrics against four categories of adversarial attacks: speaker tag prefixes, static responses, ungrammatical responses, and repeated conversational context.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To analyze the robustness of dialogue evaluation metrics and provide a nuanced evaluation framework for assessing dialogue systems.

data.annotation: Annotated with human ratings for content, grammaticality, relevance, and overall quality.

methodology.calculation: The success rate quantifies how often metrics rank adversarial responses lower than reference responses.
methodology.interpretation: A higher success rate indicates greater robustness against adversarial attacks.
methodology.validation: Metrics performance is validated against human annotations across multiple dialogue aspects.
